login-intro-config-stream: An error was encountered loading remote configuration:
interrupted-login: Login was interrupted. Please check your internet connection and try again.
generic-error-action-prompt: Please try again later or contact support.
delete-account-error: An error occurred during account deletion.
routing-error: Error navigating to the requested page:
error-message-action-prompt: Please contact support with the above error message.
select-image-error: An error occurred while processing the image, please try again.
location-service-disabled: Error fetching location. Make sure that location services are enabled on your device in order to use location-based features.
location-service-denied: Error fetching location. Make sure to allow location services in order to use location-based features.
activity-fetch-error: The activity has passed or no longer exists.
activity-fetch-missing-data: The activity has passed or no longer exists.
